name: Mission of the Lost Gem
description:
Here's your mission, astronaut. You need to find the one true green gem, that  was stolen from us by those god awful alien robots, now, this won't be an easy task, you need to get past them , not to mention their weird enviroment, but we know you can do it! Godspeed, and good hunting!

overall additions:

- added player dialog 

- added arrow controls 

- added score when destroying enemy 

- added storytelling throughout the game

level1:

- spawned acid rain that follows the player, deals damage & can be stopped with acquiring a key

level2:

- spawned waterfall that player has to get passed in order to continue the level, it can be stopped with acquiring a key

- added super jumper abilities when acquiring a key

level3:

- implemented a top down approach to the game
